amendment.description: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from transfering certain air traffic control functions to nongovernmental entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 893 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 41. Record Vote Number: 222.

action.text: Amendment SA 893 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S7786-7790, S7792-7793; text: CR S7786) To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from transfering certain air traffic control functions to nongovernmental entities.
